ygData.subject: Re: Third book....
ygData.msgSnippet: I have been researching and listening to all the jabber about the third book..and have heard just about every roumor there is known to gnome. Heard a rumor
ygData.messageBody:
I have been researching and listening to all the jabber about the third
book..and have heard just about every roumor there is known to gnome. Heard a
rumor under waves...That could be any body of water..(Taalk about the
proverbial Needle in the haystack...Sheesh!!)..I also Heard that as simple
to get for a level 1 barbarian can do.....Hmmm ...Halas??? Well if you are a
New player in Halas with a barbarian whats the places you would explore to
have fun without getting killed too easy........The lake in front is one area
that has water....How about the bottom of the well there??...Has anyone
really sayed long enough in it to exlpore it extensively?? And Barbarians
wouldnt see much in the well cause they have poor vision and once established
not going anywere it would be abandoned in looking into? Just a
thought...there is quite a few little areas in the game that have simple
small areas of water that could be overlooked because they seem be part of
the eye candy of the scenery.....Like a fountain of blood in Crushbone or
several areas of water in CB
that seem to lead nowhere....Or just Consider this ...that the tinkering is
screwed up till they patch it to make it better.....I for one have had it in
scowering searches for this book.....So...unless i come across it by accident
or given the info ....I will have no more concern for tinkering except the
casual cam or compass to make for friend....Sincerely, Cloverleaf <Fennin
Ro server>
